content:
# The stone furnace has been successfully placed at the position (-5.0, 5.0), and my inventory now reflects:
# - 18 stones
# - 10 iron ore

# The furnace is currently showing a status of "NO_FUEL" and "no ingredients to smelt," which means I need to add fuel (coal) and the stones to start the smelting process.

# First, I will need to gather some coal to fuel the furnace. Let's locate the nearest coal resource and harvest some.
move_to(nearest(Resource.Coal))  # Move to the nearest coal resource.
